actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase the amount of outside earnings which subject to further increases under the automatic adjustment provisions is permitted each year without any deductions from benefits thereunder, and to revise the method for determining such amount.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Increases the amount of outside earnings which (subject to further increases under the automatic adjustment provisions) is permitted each year without any deductions from benefits under title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act. Revises the method for determining such amount, making it dependent upon the "applicable monthly earnings limitation" as specified in this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase the amount of outside earnings which subject to further increases under the automatic adjustment provisions is permitted each year without any deductions from benefits thereunder, and to revise the method for determining such amount.
